pull.title: fuzz: Minor improvements to tx_package_eval target
pull.body: Exercises `DIFFERENT_WITNESS` by using "blank" WSH() and allowing witness to determine wtxid, and attempts to make invalid/duplicate inputs.

events.message: fuzz: allow reaching MempoolAcceptResult::ResultType::DIFFERENT_WITNESS in tx_package_eval target
fuzz: allow fake and duplicate inputs in tx_package_eval target

comments.body: is this supposed to be empty?
yes, with the idea that the fuzzer won't be able to generate the preimage to all genuinely create null uint256/prevout
